title: Handle Failed Subscription Payment
description: A customer's recurring subscription payment fails due to an expired credit card. The system needs to handle this gracefully.

tasks.description: When a recurring payment fails, identify the reason ('Expired Card').
tasks.expected_outcome: System correctly logs the payment failure reason.

tasks.description: Automatically send the customer a 'dunning' email, notifying them of the failure and providing a link to update their payment method.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends a clear and helpful notification.

tasks.description: Temporarily pause the subscription and schedule a retry of the payment in 3 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: System updates the subscription status to 'Past Due' and schedules a future payment attempt.
